caption: Agent Connect Protocol Specs
description: Specification of agent capabilities, config, input, output, and interrupts.
name: acp

capabilities.caption: Capabilities
capabilities.description: Declares what invocation features this agent is capable of.

input.caption: Input
input.description: An instance of an OpenAPI schema object, formatted as per the OpenAPI specs: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.1.html#schema-object.

output.caption: Output
output.description: This object contains an instance of an OpenAPI schema object, formatted as per the OpenAPI specs: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.1.html#schema-object.

custom_streaming_update.caption: Custom Streaming Update
custom_streaming_update.description: This describes the format of an Update in the streaming. Must be specified if `streaming.custom` capability is true and cannot be specified otherwise. Format follows: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.1.html#schema-object.

thread_state.caption: ThreadState
thread_state.description: This describes the format of ThreadState. Cannot be specified if `threads` capability is false. If not specified, when `threads` capability is true, then the API to retrieve ThreadState from a Thread or a Run is not available. This object contains an instance of an OpenAPI schema object, formatted as per the OpenAPI specs: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.1.html#schema-object.

config.caption: Configuration
config.description: This object contains an instance of an OpenAPI schema object, formatted as per the OpenAPI specs: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.1.html#schema-object.

interrupts.caption: Interrupts
interrupts.description: List of possible interrupts that can be provided by the agent. If `interrupts` capability is true, this needs to have at least one item.
